title: 07/31 Football: Kaepernick in Baltimore? Steelers, Broncos Camp Updates
description:
On a Football Monday edition of the Pick Six Podcast, Nick Kostos and Will Brinson spin around the league and hit on hot-button quarterback issues, starting with Blake Bortles stinking up the joint in Jacksonville (2:15). The guys also hit on Mitch Trubisky's fumbling issues (5:10), Xavier Rhodes' extension (8:25), Dalvin Cook looking great (9:30) and tell you whether it's time to freak out about Andrew Luck's shoulder injury (11:35). Jason La Canfora joins the guys live from Cleveland to talk Joe Flacco and the potential of Colin Kaepernick joining the Ravens (17:15). He then gives an overview of Steelers camp, including the latest on Le'Veon Bell (26:25). Pete Prisco then hops aboard live from Denver to chat about Sunday night's Game of Thrones episode (35:00), the Broncos QB battle (42:35) and if people are sleeping on the Broncos (49:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
